original_text: Jesus said, ‘Nobody can work as a slave for two masters at the same time. Maybe he will hate one of the masters, but he will love the other one. Or he will work well for one master, but he will think bad things about the other master. God and money are like different masters. You cannot work for both of them.
korean_text: 한 사람이 두 주인을 섬기지 못할 것이니 혹 이를 미워하고 저를 사랑하거나 혹 이를 중히 여기고 저를 경히 여김이라 너희가 하나님과 재물을 겸하여 섬기지 못하느니라

sentences.original_text: 'Nobody can work as a slave for two masters at the same time
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 두 주인을 동시에 섬길 수 없다

sentences.original_text: Maybe he will hate one of the masters
but he will love the other one
Or he will work well for one master
sentences.korean_translation: 또는 한 주인을 위해 잘 일할 것이고

sentences.original_text: but he will think bad things about the other master
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 주인에 대해 나쁜 생각을 할 것이다

sentences.original_text: God and money are like different masters
You cannot work for both of them
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 둘 다 섬길 수 없다
